comments.raw_text:
Steps to reproduce:
1/ Set theme to classic
2/ Create new web page
3/ Add some text
4/ Create a link

Actual Result
1/ No indication there is a link in Normal View

Expected Result
1/ Link is underlined and is a different colour in Normal View
